tags: spider man: into the spider verse
summary: Stan Lee's biggest rule in Marvel
body:
Stan Lee’s biggest rule in Marvel

I respect the hell out of Stan Lee for basically creating my childhood and their is one rule he follows and has Marvel Studio follow that I respect. Being comics stories are retconned all the time but Stan doesn’t like retconning entire characters. If someone is a certain race, has a certain belief or is of a certain orientation he sees no reason to change it. Instead what he says is that if you want to make a different sort of hero then make that hero instead of changing established ones. It’s why their are so many variations of Spider-Man, or Deadpool or any other character. Because instead of just making Peter black to be #relevant Marvel made Miles Morales the Spider-Man to get the torch handed down. It’s the best of both worlds and it’s become something of a staple to the Marvel Franchise of hero’s passing the torch to new blood. Ant-Man is a hero who has changed hands many times, Hulk might be cheating a little but Bruce has a personality disorder so sometimes a different Hulk will manifest instead of the more well known version. But they have played it straight too with She-Hulk and Doc Samson, Red Hulk and others like him. They even play around with multiple universes to try new ideas plausibly, like Doctor Octopus in Spiderverse. It’s just a good rule

Warnings: smut, unprotected sex

He looked so beautiful above you, his brown hair falling onto his face. It was a sinful position, he’s made you cum twice so far. He wasn’t planning on stopping, his moans were like honey, so sweet and pure. The way he looked at you should be illegal, he looked at you with such love and passion. He thrusted into you hard, he put his hand over your mouth to quiet the moan. His body was glistening with sweat, he shined like an angel. He was going faster, how could that even be possible? You thought. He groaned as he watched you play with your breast.

“Someone is going to hear us.” You say, he thrusts into you softly to extend the pleasure.

“I can’t help it, you are so beautiful and you feel so good around me.” He lets out a groan and bites his lip, fuck.

“I know, Peter my fath-“ You moan loudly as he hits your g-spot, he feels his cock start twitching. Your eyes widened, you both hear footsteps. He thrusts harder into you like his life depends on it, he covers your mouth. He feels your clenching pussy and he cums inside you. He bites his lips to suppress the moans, he pulls out of you and the footsteps stop.

-knock-knock-

Peter exited through the window of your room, he winks and swings away. You pull a shirt over your head and go to the door, you open it. It’s your father, Tony Stark.

“Hey dad, is something wrong?”

“No, just heard some ruckus and came to check in on you. Are you okay?”

“Of course dad, something fell and I was trying to get it without getting up.”

“Okay pumpkin, go to sleep. Love you.” He starts walking away, you lean out the door frame.

“Love you, too.” You close the door and stand behind the door.

“Fuck me.” You say, you get back into your bed and fall asleep.

Feel free to reblog ♥️ requests are open:)

summary: a day in the life in the neighborhood - Shaicarus - Spider-Man - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
title: a day in the life in the neighborhood - Shaicarus - Spider-Man - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 5/5
Fandom: Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man (Video Game 2018)
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Characters: Peter Parker, Yuriko “Yuri” Watanabe, background characters, several random OCs, Martin Li
Additional Tags: Car Accident, Breathing trouble, Whump, Hurt/Comfort, Social Media, One Shot Collection, death mention, injury mention, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Canon-Typical Violence
Chapter Summary:

But with half of them webbed to the walls and floor, the rest of the mob only seemed to get angrier. And then one of them just…stopped. A hulking tank of a man, it took Pete a second to realize there was someone behind him, and then Li stepped past and planted a hand between the next prisoner’s shoulders. Like the first, he ground to a halt.
–
pairings: none
characters: Peter Parker | Spider-Man, Martin Li | Mr. Negative, Mac Gargan | Scorpion
warnings: canon typical violence

–

One shot compilation, may be added to later

wrote another one. can’t tell if i like it, but it was a place to channel anxiety for a while.

summary: Boy Scout Dropout  Author: @flightyrock | flightyrock on ao3 Artist: @oh--stars | ohstars on ao3 Relationships: Peter Parker &...
caption:
Boy Scout Dropout

Author: @flightyrock | flightyrock on ao3

Artist: @oh–stars | ohstars on ao3

Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Steve Rogers, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Michelle Jones & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & OCs, Peter Parker & Avengers Team, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers (if you squint)       

Warnings: Graphic Depictions of Violence, Major Character Death (past)

Rating: Mature

Wordcount: 47,524

Tags: Blood, Major Character Injury, Eavesdropping, Running Away, Coming of Age, Panic Attacks, Swearing, Guilt, Broken Bones, Dark, Being Lost, alone in the woods, Fear, Anxiety, Angst with a Happy Ending, Peter Needs a Hug, Self-Hatred, Peter Parker vs. Himself, The World vs. Peter Parker, Dissociation, Boy Scouts, Camping, Getting Stuck, Stitches, Cuts, Survival, Memories, bad field trips, peter and field trips do not mix, Forests, temporary vision impairment, weed use, amateur first aid, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, (the child abuse implications aren’t strictly true), College, antics, platonically sharing a tent, Police Brutality, Gun Violence, read; the officer threatens peter with a handgun and tackles him when he doesn’t ‘comply’, Police brutality against a minor, Sleep Deprivation, blisters, Cute Kids, Death of a loved one, Grief, kids being kids, snap circuits, Small Towns, public school, Hunters, Hunting, House Plants, Kindness from strangers, Name Calling, Derogatory name calliing, lying, PIckpocketing, Dogs, peter loves doggos, Boredom, Murder, harmful self-talk, suicide ideation, lots of blood, graphic depiction of murder, self-harm (hair pulling), giant insects, Bugs, insect guts, Needles, IV, Medical stuff, rebreaking a bone (mentioned), Reunions, Happy Ending, Way Too Much Crying, Fluff, Hugs, Alternate Universe-Canon Divergence

Summary:

“‘What did you do?!’ Mr. Stark screamed. 'You’re a danger to yourself and others!’

Peter needed to get out. Get away. Far away. Far away from his mistakes. The only way to escape the voices was to outrun them.

He couldn’t stay here, not for another minute. No time for feeling, just action. So he moved.”

~~

When Peter’s stranded in the middle of nowhere after a training exercise gone wrong, it’s up to him to shoulder the consequences of his choices. Alone.

Read on ao3

Tags: Blood, Major Character Injury, Eavesdropping, Running Away, Coming of Age, Panic Attacks, Swearing, Guilt, Broken Bones, Dark, Being Lost, alone in the woods, Fear, Anxiety, Angst with a Happy Ending, Peter Needs a Hug, Self-Hatred, Peter Parker vs. Himself, The World vs. Peter Parker, Dissociation, Boy Scouts, Camping, Getting Stuck, Stitches, Cuts, Survival, Memories, bad field trips, peter and field trips do not mix, Forests, temporary vision impairment, weed use, amateur first aid, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, (the child abuse implications aren’t strictly true), College, antics, platonically sharing a tent, Police Brutality, Gun Violence, read; the officer threatens peter with a handgun and tackles him when he doesn’t ‘comply’, Police brutality against a minor, Sleep Deprivation, blisters, Cute Kids, Death of a loved one, Grief, kids being kids, snap circuits, Small Towns, public school, Hunters, Hunting, House Plants, Kindness from strangers, Name Calling, Derogatory name calliing, lying, PIckpocketing, Dogs, peter loves doggos, Boredom, Murder, harmful self-talk, suicide ideation, lots of blood, graphic depiction of murder, self-harm (hair pulling), giant insects, Bugs, insect guts, Needles, IV, Medical stuff, rebreaking a bone (mentioned), Reunions, Happy Ending, Way Too Much Crying, Fluff, Hugs, Alternate Universe-Canon Divergence

Summary:

“‘What did you do?!’ Mr. Stark screamed. 'You’re a danger to yourself and others!’

Peter needed to get out. Get away. Far away. Far away from his mistakes. The only way to escape the voices was to outrun them.

He couldn’t stay here, not for another minute. No time for feeling, just action. So he moved.”

~~

When Peter’s stranded in the middle of nowhere after a training exercise gone wrong, it’s up to him to shoulder the consequences of his choices. Alone.

summary:
Steve walks around the many firefighters on his way to the common room:
Steve: What happened!? What’s wrong with Peter!?
Tony,...
body:
Steve walks around the many firefighters on his way to the common room:

Steve: What happened!? What’s wrong with Peter!?

Tony, casually drinking his coffee: The Jonas Brothers are back and Peter can’t handle it, so he set the kitchen on fire.

Steve: …? What?

Peter, bellowing from his soul as Wanda uses her powers to keep him restrained: I’M BURNIN’ UP, BURNIN’ UP FOR YOU BABY!

blog.name: davidmann95

summary: Loved your post about Batman and the Destiny Trio! Do you have any ideas for how they might interact with adaptations of...
question: Loved your post about Batman and the Destiny Trio! Do you have any ideas for how they might interact with adaptations of Superman and/or Spider-Man?
answer: Thanks! Spidey I suspect we’ll actually end up seeing; I guess the obvious narrative there would be the guy who’s been doing this since he was their age relating to them, which would work particularly well if this was at a story point where whoever met him was really wrestling with the prospect of doing this for the rest of their lives. With Superman, while Sora would definitely freak out at meeting a classic-flavor superhero (and if he saw him from a distance at first initially mistake him for Hercules), I think the real character potential would be in his interactions with Kairi. They’re both orphans sent away from devastated worlds - though their respective emotional relationships with those homes ironically differ, with Clark mourning for Krypton but unable to even safely approach its remains, while Kairi could visit Radiant Garden any time she chooses but seems to feel little more than subdued curiosity about it - who grew up not only to find they had great power, but a title bestowed upon them as a consequence of their birth that not only puts great responsibility on their shoulders, but an expectation of perfection. Bend the plot to get the two of them chatting on their own in the Fortress and I think you could dig up a couple really special scenes.

Bend the plot to get the two of them chatting on their own in the Fortress and I think you could dig up a couple really special scenes.
